Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC14share.name: sharedInstance(privateKey:publicKey:url:mockUrl:technologyProviderId:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC14share.abstract: This is the Singleton for the FIOSDK. Initialize it with these parameters.

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC20priva.name: privatePublicKeyPair(forMnemonic:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC20priva.abstract: Generate a private and public key pair.

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC21wipeP.name: wipePrivatePublicKeys()
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC21wipeP.abstract: This method removes private and public keys from the keychain. It may throw keychain access errors while doing so.

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC29regis.name: registerFioNameOnBehalfOfUser(fioName:publicKey:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC29regis.abstract: Register a fioName for someone else using that user’s public key. CURRENTLY A MOCK!!!!

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC16addPu.name: addPublicAddress(fioAddress:chainCode:tokenCode:publicAddress:maxFee:technologyProviderId:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC16addPu.abstract: Adds a public address of the specific token to the FIO Address.

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC18addPu.name: addPublicAddresses(fioAddress:publicAddresses:maxFee:technologyProviderId:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC18addPu.abstract: Adds public addressess for specific tokens to the FIO Address.

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC21getPe.name: getPendingFioRequests(limit:offset:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC21getPe.abstract: Get Pending FIO Requests for the payer

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC21getOb.name: getObtDataByTokenCode(tokenCode:limit:offset:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC21getOb.abstract: Get ObtData associated with the public key of this FIO SDK instance.

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC10getOb.name: getObtData(limit:offset:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC10getOb.abstract: Returns ObtData associated with the public key of this FIO SDK instance.

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC11getFi.name: getFioNames(fioPublicKey:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC11getFi.abstract: Returns FIO Addresses and FIO Domains owned by given FIO public key.

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC20getFi.name: getFioAddressDetails(_:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC20getFi.abstract: Returns details about the FIO address. For the address associated with the FIO public key of the FIOSDK sharedInstance (Singleton).

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC16getPu.name: getPublicAddress(fioPublicKey:chainCode:tokenCode:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC16getPu.abstract: Returns a public address for the specified token registered under a FIO public key.

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC16getPu.name: getPublicAddress(fioAddress:chainCode:tokenCode:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC16getPu.abstract: Returns a public address for a specified FIO Address, for a given token (i.e. BTC, ETH)

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC19getFi.name: getFioPublicAddress(fioAddress:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC19getFi.abstract: Returns the FIO PublicKey, associated with the FIO address.

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC18getSe.name: getSentFioRequests(limit:offset:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC18getSe.abstract: Get Sent FIO Requests for the SDK sharedInstance(singleton) associated with the fio public key

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC13recor.name: recordObtData(fioRequestId:payerFIOAddress:payeeFIOAddress:payerTokenPublicAddress:payeeTokenPublicAddress:amount:chainCode:tokenCode:obtId:maxFee:metaData:technologyProviderId:onCompletion:)
Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC13recor.abstract: Record a transaction on another blockhain (OBT: other block chain transaction).

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC13getFi.abstract: Returns balance of the FIO Token. For the public key of the FIOSDK sharedInstance (Singleton).

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC6getFee.abstract: Returns Fee for the selected API endpoint

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC25getFe.abstract: Returns Fee for the Add Public Address API endpoint

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC24getFe.abstract: Returns Fee for the Funds Request API endpoint

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC27getFe.abstract: Returns Fee for the Request Funds API endpoint

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC22getFe.abstract: Returns Fee for the Record ObtData API endpoint

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC15pushT.abstract: Allows users to send their own content directly to FIO contracts

Classes/FIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDKAAC15pushT.abstract: Allows users to send their own content directly to FIO contracts

Classes/BaseFIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDK04Base.abstract: Returns Is the fio public key valid?

Classes/BaseFIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDK04Base.name: getPublicKey()
Classes/BaseFIOSDK.html#/s:6FIOSDK04Base.abstract: Returns the public key, as previously set at initialization of the FIOSDK singleton

Classes.html#/s:6FIOSDK8SUFUtilsC.abstract: This class helps on Smallest Units of FIO (SUF) internal calculation prior to FIO transactions. visit API specs
